alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 9:00PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Estelline. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1646.0 feet, water reaches the bottom of the bridge on 192nd Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 1645.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Tuesday was 1645.8 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1644.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Estelline 1644.0 1645.8 Tue 9 pm MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon.
